name: Voyage (oscark731)
description: Voyage is a 2-Dimensional game that takes place in multiple dystopian space settings. A miniature spacecraft (the player), has docked off from the main spaceship after an mysterious meltdown caused the spaceship to implode. The spacecraft, having lost its way far from home is now desperate to find the nearest habitual planet, going through the dangers of space debris and asteroids appearing from every direction to find the right planet. The game is made into 5 levels, each getting progressively harder as new concepts and game mechanics are introduced to the player. All artwork originated from the Unity Asset Store.
